field.label: Enable first available payment method automatically
field.comment: Automatically selects and enables the first available payment method as the default during checkout. Note: If the first payment method is initialized via JavaScript, this may cause errors in the payment process. If such errors occur, please disable this setting.

field.label: Enable first available shipping method automatically
field.comment: Automatically selects and enables the first available shipping method as the default during checkout. Note: If the first shipping method is initialized via JavaScript, this may cause errors in the shipping process. If such errors occur, please disable this setting.

field.label: Disable Main Evaluation Result Merge
field.comment: Enabling this config will disable the results from all nested components, including its own, being merged into the Main component.
